details:
It was discovered that there were two vulnerabilities libphp-phpmailer, an
email library for the PHP programming language:


* [CVE-2017-5223](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2017-5223)
Local file disclosure vulnerability via relative path HTML 
 transformations.
* [CVE-2018-19296](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2018-19296)
Object injection attack.


For Debian 8 Jessie, this issue has been fixed in libphp-phpmailer version
5.2.9+dfsg-2+deb8u4.


We recommend that you upgrade your libphp-phpmailer packages.
